title: Elegant Script Font
content:
Help with the "William" text in the pic will be so very appreciated, many thanks!

author: weinda

comments.content:
Corradine, Manuel E/Corradine Fonts/Legendaria  
Apparently 1300 glyphs to play with. Found the /ll, so the /W should be there someplace.
